education: Yiming Miao received the B.Sc. degree in College of Computer Science and Technology from QingHai Univerisity, Xining, China in 2016. Currently, she is a Ph.D candidate in School of Computer Science and Technology at Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST).
research_interest: IoT sensing, edge computing, healthcare big data and emotion-aware computing, etc.
